meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>reality</kanji> of the <kanji>truth</kanji> is nothing more than the <vocabulary>truth</vocabulary> and the <vocabulary>reality</vocabulary>. Doesn't get any more real than this.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
